questions.question: What information does the text for this course provide?

answers.answer: Extensive repair of selected hand and measuring tools
An explanation of the types and uses of hydrostatic tools
Safety requirements and limited repair of hydrostatic tools
Information on the use and care of selected hand tools and measuring tools

questions.question: With proper tools and knowledge of how to use them, what action may occur?

answers.answer: The user may face injury
The user may be more efficient
The task is accomplished in twice the time
The user may collect many unnecessary tools for the job

questions.question: The introduction to each tool chapter in the text will provide information on how to choose and use the tools, various types of tools available, and what other information?

answers.answer: How to check out tools
An example of their use
Location of the repair procedures
Where to purchase specific tools

questions.question: What action will result if you use the wrong tool to make an adjustment?

answers.answer: Accurate adjustment
Unsatisfactory adjustment
Edges of nuts and wrenches become smooth
Multiple positions are available from using a larger tool

questions.question: What statement is true concerning tools?

answers.answer: You should keep an inventory list in shop and check it after each shift
Place the extra tools on a flat ledge above the equipment for easy access
A worker's efficiency is often a direct result of the condition of the tools being used
Damaged tools should be saved because they can sometimes be used for purposes other than for which they were designed

questions.question: Who should a broken tool be returned to?

answers.answer: Supervisor
Section chief
Division officer
Safety officer
